arabic.title: أوقات بحن
text: ما هو من يوم بعده عني

english.title: Sometimes I long
text: for the touch of his hand
for a glance from his eyes
for a word from his lips
And I die of missing and longing for him
I used to say that he is mine
that he's more precious to me than my own eyes
He wouldn't leave my sight for even a day
I used to believe him for real
to heal the pain of two lovers who met
for the years to go back
so that we can taste tenderness
Well, ever since we got separated
I tried to forget him but
and I can never find it except with him
Should I choose the pain of having him by my side
Or is the pain of his absence sweeter?
He's my love and he is more deserving
that I live in pain as I love him
